book.synopsis: Detective Jigsaw Jones and his friend, Mila, have a new case to solve after they happen upon a genuine mummy at the class Halloween party. Original.
book.title_long: The Case of the Mummy Mystery (Jigsaw Jones Mystery, No. 6)
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 0.15 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
